  • @Listeners(value=ReproduceInfoPrinter.class)
 @LuceneTestCase.SuppressReproduceLine
 @LuceneTestCase.SuppressSysoutChecks(bugUrl="we log a lot on purpose")
public abstract class EsBaseDirectoryTestCase
extends org.apache.lucene.store.BaseDirectoryTestCase
